about_the_game:
Voltage Box is a challenging puzzle game where players must overcome obstacles to activate a set number of switches in each level. For those who love a challenge, try activating all the switches and collecting all stars in each level to achieve a perfect score.

Game Modes

  • Switch Activation: Players must activate switches or collect stars as specified in each level.

  • Star Entry: Players must control multiple characters simultaneously and guide them all to designated star locations together.

  • Star Collection: Players must collect scattered stars throughout the map.

Gameplay Experience

  • Designed to give puzzle lovers a challenging experience

  • Each level has a variety of difficulty levels

  • Many levels with special difficulty for those who enjoy high challenges

  • Difficulty gradually increases after level 50

  • Average playtime to finish: 3-5 hours

  • For full completion: about 10-15 hours

  • Demo version available with the same content as the full version, limited to the first 10 levels

Game Features

  • Play the Demo version (first 10 levels of the full game)

  • 100 main levels to complete

  • Over 50 unique background images

  • More than 20 types of obstacles

  • 3 mission modes

  • Challenging gameplay from start to finish

  • Simple and easy-to-understand mechanics

  • No language barriers during gameplay

  • Carefully crafted paths for an enjoyable and challenging experience

  • Achievements for completing each level perfectly

Enjoy the fun, excitement, and puzzle-solving headaches in this game!
